translated: Upon opening, in Versailles, May 5, 1789, the Estates General were to be composed of 291 members of the Clergy, 270 and 578 of Nobility Third State.
original: À leur ouverture, à Versailles, le 5 mai 1789, les États généraux devaient se composer de 291 députés du Clergé, 270 de la Noblesse et 578 du Tiers-Etat.
